about_the_game:
You play Vesna, a healer responsible for helping the villagers coexist with the supernatural beings that live in the mountain. Some call you a witch while others, like Sana, call you a friend. To help the people afflicted by spirits, you’ll need to record your recipes and find ingredients scattered throughout the mountain.

Help Sana

Sana, an old friend, is hiding her eyes. To find out what's wrong, you should make her favorite tea, but there’s a problem: you’re slowly losing your memory. Will you remember the recipe?

Remember your recipes

In your hands, cooking has the power to cure strange ailments caused by spiritual distress. Living so close to the spirits has addled your mind, but you can trigger memories of your most potent recipes by exploring the environment.

Gather the right ingredients

The mountain is full of herbs, flowers, and seeds you can use in your cooking, and if you look closely, you’re sure to find some less conventional ingredients.

Heal with cooking

Cook a mix of traditional Slavic dishes, drinks from distant lands, and a few strange concoctions to heal the physical and spiritual ailments of the people you meet.

Learn the laws of the land

Unseen, ancient beings dwell in the mountains. Like a sentient script, they tie the realm of thought to the physical world and shape the matter around them. As a healer, you speak their language and use it to help other people whose thoughts have transformed their reality.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics or AMD (formerly ATI) Radeon HD Graphics (Discrete): Nvidia GeForce 9600 GT or AMD Radeon HD 2400
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

short_description: Tea for Sana is a story-driven exploration game set in the mountains of a Slavic-inspired fantasy world. Discover recipes, forage for ingredients, and cook traditional dishes to restore the balance between the mountain spirits and the villagers below.
